metadata.title: Sawdust Is Man Glitter TShirt Craftsman Cabinetmaker Top TS
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester

Do you know any Carpenters or Woodworkers? Are you a Carpenter or Woodworker? Do you fix up old furniture as a hobby or as a job? Mend tables, re-upholster chairs, always close to hammer and nails, a buzzsaw? Carpentry is an awesome thing to do - show the carpenter in your life how much they mean to you with this great gift! Stocking filler for your boyfriend, girlfriend, mother, father, brother, sister, aunt, uncle, cousin, niece, nephew, grandson, grandaughter, grandfather, grandmother.

Sawdust is a by product of doing awesome stuff! Some call it man glitter. Either way it's pretty masculine stuff, this funny retro vintage style Tee Shirt is a great gift for the artisan joiner mason chips craftsperson laborer carps builder man (or woman) in your life that works with wood. You or someone you know will love this T-Shirt as a Gift - a Christmas present, birthday present, graduation gift, sports, Fathers day, Mothers Day, Thanksgiving, secret santa, anniversary, wedding.
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: High quality cool fun tshirts delivered straight to you, show your spirit with one of our eye catching designs. It's kind of our thing here to provide only the highest quality products and spread the word. Enjoy your purchase and see you back here soon! These T-shirts are designed to fit comfortably providing freedom of movement. Suitable for all types of pants, jeans, shorts, and sweatpants, for a casual and absolutely unique look. 100% Cotton making it very comfortable. Soft covered seams on neck and shoulders. Collar lays flat and stays flat keeps its shape wash after wash. Tag free for all day comfort. This T-shirt is made of the highest quality cotton, which will last you for years! Select one of the available colors for your own fashionable preference. Print may be smaller or larger depending on the T-shirt size, sizes due run fair. Best gift for yourself, a friend, partner, or family member.
